label: CoordinateReferenceSystem
comment: A coordinate reference system that is used in a contextually local sense to describe the relative locations of objects in which coordinates of points are recorded in a Coordinate System (CS) (reference ISO 19111).

objectProperties.comment: The identifier for this CS engineering coordinate reference system.
The level, expressed as text, of this CS engineering coordinate reference system.
The name, expressed as text, for this CS engineering coordinate reference system.
A delimited period specified for this CS engineering coordinate reference system.
A CS engineering coordinate reference system subordinate to this CS engineering coordinate reference system.

referencedBy.comment: A CS engineering coordinate reference system subordinate to this CS engineering coordinate reference system.
